title: Trump, Tiger King, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Trump, Tiger King, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's about to poptopoptopop off!!!! Uncle Steve aka The Chief Love Officer breaks down the art of complimenting. Trump has a conversation about giving The Tiger King a pardon. Bernie Sanders has officially dropped out of the presidential race. Junior gives us an update regarding his dating situation. Sheryl Underwood is "Ridin' with Biden" and shares her thoughts about Bernie Sanders. Miss Carla covers the drama in Greece from RHOA, updates us with The Kardashians, plus more in Reality Update. The Corona Beer factory in Mexico has shut down due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog reminds us that behind every moment of adversity is a lesson and a blessing along with more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
